title: Must Watch: Get amped for Red Bull Rampage by dropping off a 4-story building
content:
There’s no denying that Red Bull Rampage is a spectacle of extreme mountain biking that we can’t take our eyes off. But it’s hard to really grasp the scale of 70′ drops, 75′ gap jumps & 85° lead-in ramps out in the vast scale of desert cliffs – all with crazy flips & tricks thrown

The post Must Watch: Get amped for Red Bull Rampage by dropping off a 4-story building appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
